sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Milwaukee joins other municipalities in suing fire truck manufacturers
feed.summary: The City of Milwaukee has filed a lawsuit against three fire truck manufacturers—REV Group, Oshkosh Corp., and Rosenbauer America—accusing them of colluding to inflate prices and limit supply. This action joins a federal class-action lawsuit initiated by the City of La Crosse, alleging that these companies used the Fire Apparatus Manufacturers' Association to facilitate anticompetitive practices. Milwaukee city officials emphasize that taxpayers bear the burden of these increased costs for essential emergency equipment, and the litigation aims to ensure fair competition and protect public safety.

feed.title: OPEN - Opendoor Technologies Inc Latest Stock News & Market Updates
feed.summary: This page provides the latest news and updates for Opendoor Technologies Inc. (Nasdaq: OPEN), an e-commerce platform for residential real estate transactions. It includes company press releases, earnings communications, and regulatory updates, highlighting leadership changes, financial results, strategic objectives, and shareholder programs such as special dividends and warrant distributions. The company is actively focusing on AI integration and pursuing a path to profitability.

feed.title: NOVONIX Seeks ASX Quotation for Over 1 Million New Shares
feed.summary: NOVONIX Ltd (AU:NVX) has applied to the ASX for the quotation of 1,008,567 new ordinary fully paid shares, scheduled for issuance and quotation on February 27, 2026. This modest share issuance aims to expand the company's capital base and may slightly improve liquidity for shareholders, indicating continued engagement with equity markets as NOVONIX advances its battery materials and technology business. While the issuance is small, it supports operational and growth objectives without significantly altering the capital structure, coinciding with a recent analyst "Sell" rating and a A$0.36 price target.

feed.title: Dominion Energy calls for continued federal aid for struggling households
feed.summary: Dominion Energy representatives met with federal lawmakers in Washington to advocate for continued funding for the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Program (LIHEAP). They highlighted the importance of LIHEAP in helping vulnerable households cope with rising energy costs, especially during severe weather. Dominion Energy also encouraged customers to explore other available support options like EnergyShare and various payment plans.

feed.title: Inside the secretive data centers powering the AI boom
feed.summary: The article explores the secretive world of data centers, crucial for powering the AI boom. Scripps News gained rare access to Digital Realty's Dallas campus, highlighting the stringent security, massive scale, and energy demands of these facilities. Demand for data centers is projected to triple by 2030, raising major questions about energy use and sustainability.

feed.title: Sempra Energy (NYSE:SRE) Raises Dividend to $0.66 Per Share
feed.summary: Sempra Energy (NYSE:SRE) has increased its quarterly dividend to $0.6575 per share, marking the 22nd consecutive year of dividend increases for the utilities provider. The company's Q4 earnings beat analyst EPS estimates ($1.28 vs. $1.12) but revenue missed expectations, while management also boosted its five-year capital spending plan and raised its 2030 EPS outlook, contributing to a slight increase in stock price. Analysts such as Morgan Stanley maintain a positive outlook on the stock.

feed.title: Has The Market Run Too Far On Bank of New York Mellon Corporation (BK) After 43% One-Year Gain?
feed.summary: This article analyzes Bank of New York Mellon Corporation (BK) after its significant 43% one-year gain, using two valuation approaches. While the Excess Returns model suggests the stock is slightly overvalued at US$121.61 compared to its intrinsic value of US$111.90, the Price vs Earnings approach indicates it is slightly undervalued compared to Simply Wall St's Fair Ratio. The article encourages investors to use "Narratives" on its platform to personalize valuation based on their own assumptions about the company's future.

feed.title: Fresh Bond Issuance And Analyst Upgrades Might Change The Case For Investing In U.S. Bancorp (USB)
feed.summary: U.S. Bancorp recently issued over US$80 million in long-dated bonds and received positive analyst upgrades following stronger-than-expected Q4 2025 earnings. This has shifted sentiment around the company, reinforcing its funding flexibility and highlighting improved operational performance. Despite these positive developments, investors are cautioned to consider ongoing growth challenges, insider selling, and rising cybersecurity threats.

feed.title: How Elevance Health Is — and Isn’t — Using AI
feed.summary: Elevance Health is leveraging AI to streamline various operations like prior authorizations, claims processing, and member support, while crucially maintaining human oversight for all denial decisions. The company emphasizes a responsible AI approach, with a governance program aligned with the NIST framework, and collaborates with Big Tech and healthcare AI startups to integrate real-world healthcare complexities into AI development. Ratnakar Lavu, Elevance Health's chief digital information officer, highlights their commitment to balancing innovation with safety and trust in AI deployment.

feed.title: MGM Resorts Partnering with Flavor Flav on Las Vegas Women’s Hockey Team Bash
feed.summary: MGM Resorts International announced its partnership with rapper Flavor Flav to co-host a celebration in Las Vegas for the victorious U.S. women's Olympic hockey team. The "She Got Game" event, scheduled for July 16-19, will honor the team after they declined a White House invitation and will include accommodations, a parade, and a concert. Flavor Flav also launched a GoFundMe campaign to provide "victory bonuses" directly to the athletes, which has already raised over $34,000.

feed.title: Western Digital (WDC) Valuation Check After Strong Recent Share Price Momentum
feed.summary: Western Digital (WDC) has experienced a significant 73% share price increase over the last three months, prompting a re-evaluation of its current valuation. Despite this momentum, a common narrative suggests the stock is 51% overvalued, with a fair value estimated around $187 per share compared to its trading price of $282.25. While its P/E ratio of 24.3x is below the peer average, suggesting some market caution, investors are encouraged to consider potential risks, rewards, and alternative investment opportunities.

feed.title: Bleichroeder Acquisition Corp. I (NASDAQ:BACQ) Major Shareholder Goldman Sachs Group Inc Sells 4,444 Shares
feed.summary: Goldman Sachs Group Inc. has reduced its stake in Bleichroeder Acquisition Corp. I (NASDAQ:BACQ) by selling 4,444 shares on December 5th for $47,995.20, decreasing its ownership by 0.14%. Despite other minor transactions, including both buys and sells, the overall activity indicates a slight net reduction in Goldman Sachs's holdings. The article also notes BACQ's recent trading performance, simple moving averages, 52-week range, and a reaffirmed "Sell" rating from Weiss Ratings.

feed.title: Insider Sell: Mark Mouadeb Sells Shares of Capital One Financial Corp
feed.summary: Mark Mouadeb, President, Card at Capital One Financial Corp (COF), sold 1,509 shares of the company on February 25, 2026. This transaction follows a period where there have been no insider buys and 24 insider sells for COF in the past year. The stock is currently trading at $202.62, and with a GuruFocus Value of $144.24, it is considered significantly overvalued.

feed.title: Insider Sell Alert: Holly Kriendler Sells Shares of Oceaneering International Inc (OII)
feed.summary: Holly Kriendler, Senior Vice President and Chief Human Resources Officer at Oceaneering International Inc (OII), sold 24,805 shares of the company on February 26, 2026. This transaction leaves her with 24,702 shares. Oceaneering International Inc is currently trading at $37.63, with a price-to-GF-Value ratio of 1.47, indicating it is significantly overvalued according to GuruFocus's intrinsic value estimate.

feed.title: Axon Enterprise Inc (AXON) CEO Patrick Smith Sells 10,000 Shares
feed.summary: Axon Enterprise Inc CEO Patrick Smith sold 10,000 shares of the company on February 25, 2026. This transaction reduces his total holdings to 3,090,997 shares. Over the past year, Smith has sold 80,000 shares with no purchases, while the company has seen 1 insider buy and 40 insider sells. The stock is currently trading at $500.24 and is considered fairly valued according to GuruFocus's GF Value.

feed.title: Insider Sell: Michael Sondel Sells Shares of Analog Devices Inc (ADI)
feed.summary: Michael Sondel, Chief Accounting Officer of Analog Devices Inc (ADI), sold 4,199 shares of the company on February 25, 2026. This transaction is part of a trend of insider selling at ADI, with 38 insider sells and no buys over the past year. The stock is currently trading at $361.03, with a high price-to-earnings ratio and is considered significantly overvalued according to GuruFocus's GF Value.

feed.title: Extra Space Storage outlines vehicle unit requirements with 10x20 standard for cars
feed.summary: Extra Space Storage has issued detailed guidance on appropriate storage unit sizes for different types of vehicles. According to the company, a 10x20 unit is generally suitable for standard cars, SUVs, and most trucks. They also recommend smaller 10x15 units for compact cars and larger 10x25 or 10x30 units for big vehicles like F-150s, emphasizing the importance of careful measurement.

feed.title: Sherwin-Williams’ Hinckley flex space
feed.summary: Sherwin-Williams (SHW) is facing an overflow issue at its new headquarters in downtown Cleveland, which was completed in 2024. The company is now assessing employee occupancy to make further facility decisions. This article highlights the initial situation of their new HQ overflowing, hinting at future space management strategies.

feed.title: Novavax (NVAX) Turns Profitable With US$440 Million TTM Net Income Challenging Bearish Views
feed.summary: Novavax (NVAX) has become profitable in FY 2025, reporting a trailing 12-month net income of US$440.3 million and a P/E ratio of 4.1x. Despite this profitability, analysts forecast revenue and earnings to decline by approximately 30.7% and 48.3% per year respectively over the next three years, raising concerns about its financial stability due to negative shareholder equity and weak debt coverage. The article highlights a tension between the company's recent profitability and bearish analyst forecasts, suggesting a need for investors to carefully evaluate both the bullish and bearish narratives.

feed.title: Will S&P Global’s (SPGI) Private Debt Index Push Deepen Its Data Moat and Earnings Quality?
feed.summary: S&P Global (SPGI) recently reported strong quarterly results and launched new indices for private senior debt, expanding its reach into the private loan market. This move is expected to bolster S&P Global’s data moat and earnings quality by diversifying its revenue streams beyond public debt and equity issuance, potentially offsetting cyclicality. Investors are encouraged to assess the impact of this expansion on future earnings stability and consider various valuation assumptions.

feed.title: Partners Unveil Plan for Outdoor Amphitheater on The Riverfront in Cleveland
feed.summary: Bedrock and Rock Entertainment Group, in partnership with Live Nation, plan to build and operate a new 6,200-seat outdoor amphitheater on The Riverfront in downtown Cleveland. This venue is expected to host a variety of concerts and festivals, attracting visitors, generating an annual economic impact of $59 million, and reinforcing Cleveland's reputation as a top music city. The project is part of a larger initiative to revitalize the Cuyahoga River waterfront and connect it with downtown Cleveland.

feed.title: Insider Selling: Vertex Pharmaceuticals (NASDAQ:VRTX) EVP Sells 1,846 Shares of Stock
feed.summary: Vertex Pharmaceuticals (NASDAQ:VRTX) Executive Vice President Amit Sachdev sold 1,846 shares of the company's stock for approximately $897,802 on February 25th, reducing his stake by 3.22%. This sale was part of a larger cluster of insider disposals totaling about $4.6 million, which led to a slight dip in VRTX stock. Despite the insider selling, analysts maintain a "Moderate Buy" rating with a consensus price target of $542, supported by solid Q4 revenue growth of 9.5%.

feed.title: Engine Capital Management, Lp Acquires 124,797 Shares of Orthofix Medical (NASDAQ:OFIX) Stock
feed.summary: Engine Capital Management, LP increased its stake in Orthofix Medical (NASDAQ:OFIX) by purchasing 124,797 shares on February 24th and an additional 13,061 shares on February 25th, bringing its total ownership to 3,663,133 shares valued at approximately $46 million. This acquisition increased their holding by 3.53%. The company recently reported an earnings miss with an EPS of -$0.06 against an expected $0.44, and analysts forecast an average "Hold" rating for the stock with a target price of $18.25.

feed.title: Packaging Corp (NYSE: PKG) president receives 11,719-share RSU stock award
feed.summary: Thomas A. Hassfurther, President of Packaging Corp of America (NYSE: PKG), was awarded 11,719 restricted stock units (RSUs) on February 25, 2026, as reported in a Form 4 SEC filing. This grant, valued at $0.00 per unit, is a stock-based compensation and not a market purchase. Following this award, Hassfurther directly holds 204,265 shares of common stock, with additional indirect holdings through a 401(k) plan, his spouse, and an investment entity.

feed.title: Insider Sell: Rohit Grover Sells Shares of The Hershey Co (HSY)
feed.summary: Rohit Grover, President, International of The Hershey Co (HSY), sold 3,500 shares of the company on February 24, 2026, reducing his total ownership to 34,568 shares. This sale is part of a trend over the past year with more insider sells than buys for HSY. The stock was trading at $226.07, indicating it is fairly valued according to GuruFocus's GF Value, despite having a higher P/E ratio than the industry median.

feed.title: Holly Kriendler Sells 5,798 Shares of Oceaneering International (NYSE:OII) Stock
feed.summary: Holly Kriendler, an SVP at Oceaneering International (NYSE:OII), sold 5,798 shares of the company's stock on February 26th for $37.31 per share, totaling over $216,000. This sale, combined with another recent sale on February 25th, reduced her stake by 19.01%. Several other Oceaneering insiders, including COO Benjamin Laura, also executed significant share sales, a pattern that could influence investor sentiment.

feed.title: Oceaneering International (NYSE:OII) SVP Earl Childress Sells 22,518 Shares of Stock
feed.summary: Oceaneering International's SVP Earl Childress sold 22,518 shares of the company's stock for approximately $842,398 on February 25th, reducing his stake by 38.76%. This sale is part of a broader trend of insider selling at Oceaneering, which has impacted market sentiment despite recent analyst upgrades. The company recently reported earnings that beat estimates but missed revenue expectations, and its stock is trading near its 52-week high with a "Moderate Buy" consensus rating.

feed.title: Oceaneering International (NYSE:OII) SVP Sells $400,664.64 in Stock
feed.summary: Oceaneering International (NYSE:OII) SVP Jennifer Fremont Simons sold 10,284 shares of company stock for a total of $400,664.64, reducing her stake by over 22%. This comes amidst several other insider sales by senior executives and a director this week which could negatively impact investor sentiment. Despite recent analyst upgrades and a moderate buy rating, the stock is trading near its 52-week high, and the insider selling activity is noted as a potential concern.

feed.title: Orthofix Medical (NASDAQ:OFIX) Major Shareholder Buys $169,270.56 in Stock
feed.summary: Engine Capital Management, Lp, a major shareholder in Orthofix Medical (NASDAQ:OFIX), recently increased its stake by purchasing 13,061 shares for $169,270.56 on February 25th and 124,797 shares on February 24th for approximately $1.566 million. Following these transactions, the insider now owns 3,673,092 shares valued at roughly $47.6 million. Orthofix Medical also reported its latest quarterly earnings, with an EPS of ($0.06), missing consensus estimates, but revenue slightly beat expectations, causing the stock to trade up about 1% to $13.17.

feed.title: Is Halliburton (HAL) Still Attractively Priced After A 41% One Year Share Price Gain
feed.summary: Halliburton (HAL) has seen significant share price gains, with a 40.9% increase over the past year. A Discounted Cash Flow (DCF) analysis suggests the stock is undervalued by 53.9% at its current price of US$35.71, with an intrinsic value estimated at US$77.41 per share. Conversely, its P/E ratio of 23.31x is close to industry averages and Simply Wall St's "Fair Ratio" of 22.85x, indicating it's "about right" by this metric, with bull and bear case narratives offering different fair value perspectives.

feed.title: John Deere Showcases New 25-HP Compact Tractor at World Ag Expo
feed.summary: John Deere unveiled its new 25-horsepower 1-Series compact tractor at the World Ag Expo, designed for comfort, flexibility, and efficiency for California farmers. The tractor features a heated and air-conditioned cab, cruise control, and quick-attach options for various tasks. Its user-friendly twin-touch pedal system aims to address labor challenges by simplifying operation.

feed.title: Cencora CEO Selling Wave Prompts Fresh Look At Risks And Valuation
feed.summary: Cencora's CEO, Robert Mauch, has recently sold a significant number of company shares with no corresponding insider purchases, drawing attention to management's sentiment toward the company. This pattern of insider selling, totaling 65,360 shares over the past year including a recent sale of 3,762 shares on February 20, 2026, without any insider buying across the company, prompts investors to scrutinize the risks and valuation of Cencora (NYSE:COR). Despite this, the company reported 16.4% earnings growth and is estimated to be trading 39% below fair value with a projected annual earnings growth of 15.98%, posing a potential risk-reward scenario for investors comfortable with its debt levels and industry risks.

feed.title: Should You Buy Arista Networks Before Its Next Earnings Report?
feed.summary: The article discusses whether investors should consider buying Arista Networks (NYSE: ANET) before its next earnings report, highlighting its role in the AI boom with high-speed Ethernet networking. Despite its 29% revenue growth and expanding margins, The Motley Fool's Stock Advisor team did not include Arista Networks in their top 10 stock recommendations, noting the significant returns achieved by past recommendations like Netflix and Nvidia. The piece emphasizes the importance of sustained demand and execution for Arista Networks to reach a $200 valuation.

feed.title: Northern Trust (NASDAQ:NTRS) CFO David Fox Jr Sells 1,450 Shares
feed.summary: Northern Trust's CFO, David Fox Jr., sold 1,450 shares of the company's stock on February 25th for a total of $208,872.50, reducing his holding by 6.71% to 20,162 shares. The sale followed Northern Trust beating quarterly EPS estimates and announcing a $0.80 quarterly dividend. The company's stock has a consensus price target of $148.75 from analysts.

feed.title: Vertex Pharmaceuticals (NASDAQ:VRTX) EVP Mark Bunnage Sells 620 Shares
feed.summary: Vertex Pharmaceuticals EVP Mark Bunnage sold 620 shares of VRTX stock, valued at $301,537, on February 25th, reducing his stake by 7.84%. This sale is part of a larger trend of insider disposals by other senior executives totaling approximately $4.6 million, which could signal personal liquidity needs or create short-term selling pressure. The company's stock trades near $480 with a market cap of $122 billion, following a recent Q4 earnings report that saw revenue increase but slightly missed EPS estimates.

feed.title: Insider Selling: Vertex Pharmaceuticals (NASDAQ:VRTX) EVP Sells 4,910 Shares of Stock
feed.summary: Duncan Mckechnie, EVP of Vertex Pharmaceuticals (NASDAQ:VRTX), sold 4,910 shares of company stock on February 25th for a total value of $2,394,361.50, decreasing his position by 21.85%. This transaction leaves him with 17,559 shares valued at approximately $8,562,646.35. The sale was disclosed amidst mixed sentiments for VRTX, including a slight EPS miss but overall strong fundamentals and a "Moderate Buy" consensus rating from analysts on average.

feed.title: Medtronic (NYSE:MDT) EVP Sells $5,132,120.04 in Stock
feed.summary: Medtronic PLC EVP Harry Skip Kiil sold 52,524 shares of the company's stock for over $5.1 million on February 19th. This sale reduced his direct ownership in the company by 61.58%. Following this transaction, his remaining shares are valued at over $3.2 million.

feed.title: BlackRock’s Kushel J. Richard sells $2.58 million in stock By Investing.com
feed.summary: J. Richard Kushel, Senior Managing Director at BlackRock, sold 2,385 shares of the company's stock for a total of $2.58 million on February 24, 2026. Following these transactions, Kushel directly owns 61,980.34 shares and indirectly owns 92,488 shares through family trusts. InvestingPro analysis indicates that BlackRock's stock, currently trading around $1,090.27, appears overvalued relative to its Fair Value.

feed.title: Nixxy Receives Nasdaq Notice for Minimum Bid Price Noncompliance
feed.summary: Nixxy has received a notice from Nasdaq for noncompliance with the $1.00 minimum bid price rule, as its shares traded below this threshold for 30 consecutive business days. The company has an initial 180-day grace period to regain compliance, with a possible extension, before facing potential delisting. Despite the notice, Nixxy's shares continue to trade, and the company emphasizes that its business operations and SEC reporting are unaffected, though its AI Analyst, Spark, rates NIXX as an "Underperform" due to significant financial challenges.

feed.title: Jacobs Issues Senior Notes to Fund PA Consulting Acquisition
feed.summary: Jacobs Solutions is issuing $1.3 billion in senior notes to fund its acquisition of the remaining shares of PA Consulting, with the notes offering expected to close on March 3, 2026. PA Consulting shareholders have already approved the acquisition, pending regulatory and court approvals. Spark, TipRanks’ AI Analyst, rates J stock as Outperform due to strong cash flow and a constructive earnings outlook.

feed.title: Pertamina and Halliburton enter cooperation pact covering integrated hydraulic fracturing services
feed.summary: Pertamina and Halliburton have signed a cooperation agreement to accelerate the application of new technologies in drilling and stimulating wells in Indonesia. This pact focuses on integrated hydraulic fracturing, acid stimulation, and advanced cementing services, aiming to rejuvenate Indonesia's existing oil and gas reserves and unlock unconventional resource potential. The collaboration highlights Pertamina's strategic vision to transform its upstream business model, increase domestic oil production, and enhance energy security through technological advancements.

feed.title: Nutex Health Inc. (NUTX) — Deep Value Healthcare Delivery And Hospital Management Platform
feed.summary: This article highlights Nutex Health Inc. (NUTX) as a potentially deeply undervalued healthcare delivery and hospital management platform. The company operates a hybrid model focusing on micro-hospitals and specialty care, demonstrating strong financials with high revenue, profitability, and free cash flow. Despite market concerns typical for small-cap healthcare operators, its intrinsic value and Acquirer’s Multiple suggest significant upside for value-oriented investors.

feed.title: FedEx says it will return any tariff refunds to customers, shippers who paid them
feed.summary: FedEx announced it will return any tariff refunds it receives from the federal government to its customers and shippers who originally paid them. This decision follows a Supreme Court ruling that struck down as illegal a portion of former President Donald Trump's tariffs imposed under the International Emergency Economic Powers Act (IEEPA). FedEx has sued the government for these refunds, indicating its commitment to transparency and to passing on any returned funds to those who bore the initial cost.

feed.title: Union Pacific rebuilding Lincoln railroad bridge destroyed by unattended campfire
feed.summary: Union Pacific is currently rebuilding a railroad bridge in Lincoln that was destroyed by a fire caused by an unattended campfire. The article mentions this incident and includes several unrelated news updates.
feed.source: KOLN | Nebraska Local News, Weather, Sports | Lincoln, NE
feed.source_domain: KOLN | Nebraska Local News, Weather, Sports | Lincoln, NE

feed.title: Pembina Pipeline (PBA) Surpasses Q4 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
feed.summary: Pembina Pipeline (PBA) exceeded Q4 earnings and revenue estimates, reporting $0.56 per share against an expected $0.50, and revenues of $1.37 billion. Despite beating estimates, the company's stock has a Zacks Rank #4 (Sell) due to unfavorable estimate revisions, suggesting potential underperformance in the near future. Another industry peer, South Bow Corporation (SOBO), is expected to report its Q4 results soon.

feed.title: PBA Reports Decrease in Q4 Revenue
feed.summary: Pembina Pipeline Corporation (PBA) reported a decrease in Q4 revenue to C$1.91 billion from C$2.15 billion year-over-year. Despite the revenue decline, the company maintains a strong operating margin of 36.46%, indicating efficient operations. However, concerns about liquidity, a high dividend payout ratio, and an Altman Z-Score in the distress zone suggest potential risks for investors.

feed.title: Proficient Auto Logistics appoints Saia IT executive to board
feed.summary: Proficient Auto Logistics (NASDAQ:PAL) has appointed Rohit Lal, Executive Vice President of IT Strategy at Saia, Inc (NASDAQ:SAIA), to its board of directors. Lal brings extensive experience in enterprise technology strategy and digital transformation. This appointment is expected to enhance Proficient's long-term strategy and focus on scalable growth, despite the company's recent stock decline and Q4 2025 earnings miss.

feed.title: NSA Q4 2025 Earnings: FFO Beats Forecast, Revenue Slightly Misses - News and Statistics
feed.summary: National Storage Affiliates Trust (NSA) reported its Q4 2025 financial results, exceeding analyst expectations for Funds From Operations (FFO) with $77.4 million (57 cents per share) against a forecast of 55 cents per share. However, the company's revenue of $187 million slightly missed analyst projections of $187.2 million. For the full year, NSA's FFO reached $301.7 million and annual revenue was $752.9 million, with future guidance for FFO set between $2.13 and $2.25 per share.

feed.title: Net Lease Office Properties FFO Loss In Q4 2025 Reinforces Bearish Narratives
feed.summary: Net Lease Office Properties (NLOP) reported a significant Funds From Operations (FFO) loss of US$44.6 million in Q4 2025, alongside a basic EPS loss and a US$0.05 million net income loss. This volatility in FFO, coupled with a US$145.3 million trailing twelve-month net income loss, reinforces bearish perspectives despite relatively stable revenue. The article highlights the tension between a modelled DCF fair value of US$103.68 and its current market price of US$13.96, urging investors to evaluate the long-term trends and risk profile.

feed.title: Insider Sell: Dominic Piscitelli Sells 52,000 Shares of ORIC Pha
feed.summary: Dominic Piscitelli, the CFO of ORIC Pharmaceuticals Inc (ORIC), sold 52,000 shares on February 24, 2026, reducing his holdings to 68,148 shares. This sale is part of a trend for Piscitelli, who has sold a total of 133,720 shares in the past year with no purchases, contributing to a broader pattern of insider selling at the company (1 buy vs. 13 sells). Shares were trading at $13.51 with a market cap of $1.314 billion at the time of the transaction.
